rules.suggestion: Add alt attribute to img elements for screen readers
fix_commands: Add alt attribute:
Use empty alt="" for decorative images
Provide meaningful alt text describing the image content

rules.suggestion: Associate labels with form controls using for attribute or wrap input in label
fix_commands: Use for attribute: <label for="input-id">
Wrap input in label: <label>Name <input></label>
Use aria-label for inputs without visible labels

rules.suggestion: Add keyboard event handlers (keydown/keyup) alongside click handlers
fix_commands: Add keydown handler: on:keydown={handleKeydown}
Check for Enter/Space keys in keyboard handler
Use role="button" and tabindex="0" for non-button clickable elements

rules.suggestion: Add appropriate ARIA attributes for screen readers
fix_commands: Add aria-label for elements without visible text
Use aria-describedby for additional descriptions
Add aria-expanded for collapsible elements

rules.suggestion: Use valid ARIA roles from the ARIA specification
fix_commands: Use valid ARIA roles: button, navigation, main, article, etc.
Check ARIA specification for correct role names
Remove invalid or custom roles

rules.suggestion: Maintain proper heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3, etc.) in order
fix_commands: Use headings in order: h1 -> h2 -> h3
Don't skip heading levels
Use only one h1 per page

rules.suggestion: Manage focus properly for dynamic content and modals
fix_commands: Set focus to first element in modals
Return focus to trigger element when closing modals
Use tabindex="-1" for programmatic focus

rules.suggestion: Ensure sufficient color contrast for text readability
fix_commands: Use WCAG contrast ratio guidelines (4.5:1 for normal text)
Test color combinations with accessibility tools
Avoid relying solely on color to convey information

rules.suggestion: Use semantic HTML elements instead of generic divs and spans
fix_commands: Use <button> instead of <div> for clickable elements
Use <nav>, <main>, <article>, <section> for page structure
Use <input> instead of contenteditable divs for form inputs

rules.suggestion: Add skip links for keyboard navigation
fix_commands: Add skip to main content link at page top
Include skip navigation links
Make skip links visible on focus

rules.suggestion: Use ARIA live regions for dynamic content updates
fix_commands: Add aria-live="polite" for non-urgent updates
Use aria-live="assertive" for important announcements
Use role="status" or role="alert" for status messages

rules.suggestion: Make form validation errors accessible to screen readers
fix_commands: Use aria-describedby to associate error messages with inputs
Add role="alert" to error message containers
Ensure error messages are announced by screen readers
